    /**
     * 
     * @constructor
     * Creates a new icon element which are not assigned to any canvas.

     * @param {Object} attr the configuration of the shape
     */
    init: function(attr, setter, getter ) {
      this._super($.extend({width:50,height:50},attr), setter, getter);
